Definitions: The compass direction that a topographic slope faces, usually measured in degrees from north. Aspect can be generated from continuous elevation surfaces.
The soil bulk density (BD) is the mass of soil material divided by the total volume of solids and pores.
Annual potential evapotranspiration: a measure of the ability of the atmosphere to remove water through evapotranspiration processes, given unlimited moisture.
Thornthwaite aridity index: Index of the degree of water deficit below water need. This measure is strongly influenced by how much water is available.
A metric of relative wetness and aridity.
Average temp. of warmest month - average temp. of coldest month.
Emberger’s pluviothermic quotient: a metric that was designed to differentiate among Mediterranean type climates.
Sum of mean monthly temperature for months with mean temperature greater than 0℃ multiplied by number of days.
Sum of mean monthly temperature for months with mean temperature greater than 5℃ multiplied by number of days.
Maximum temperature of the coldest month.
Minimum temperature of the warmest month.
Count of the number of months with mean temp greater than 10℃.
Mean monthly PET of coldest quarter. PET = potential evapotranspiration, a measure of the ability of the atmosphere to remove water through evapotranspiration processes, given unlimited moisture.
Monthly variability in potential evapotranspiration.
Mean monthly PET of warmest quarter.
Mean monthly PET of wettest quarter.
Compensated thermicity index: sum of mean annual temp., min. temp. of coldest month, max. temp. of the coldest month, x 10, with compensations for better comparability across the globe.
The soil organic carbon (SOC) increases the water-holding capacity of soil.
pH, measured in CaCl2 solution. A low pH means an acidic soil.
Slope is the percent change in elevation over a certain distance.
Annual Mean Temperature
Mean Diurnal Range (Mean of monthly (max temp - min temp))
Isothermality (BIO2/BIO7) (×100)
Temperature Seasonality (standard deviation ×100)

Mean Temperature of Coldest Quarter
